i1.name: Second Skin
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kai'Sa's''' basic attacks deal {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|7|4 to 10|1;3;6;9;11;14;17}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{passive progression/deprecated version|5|changedisplay=true|1 to 5|1;4 to 16}} per Plasma stack)|buzzword}} {{as|(+ {{passive progression/deprecated version|5|key=%|type=Plasma stacks|changedisplay=true|10 to 20|0 to 4}} AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Caustic Wounds:}} '''Kai'Sa's''' [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}}, and nearby allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects mark enemies with {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} for 4 seconds, [[stack]]ing up to 4 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. '''Kai'Sa's''' attacks or {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}} against enemies with {{as|4 Plasma|buzzword}} rupture them, consuming them to deal {{sti|health|{{as|15% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''missing''' health}}}} {{as|magic damage}}, capped at 400 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Living Weapon:}} Upon gaining a set amount of permanent [[Champion statistic|stats]] from [[item]]s and {{tt|stat growth|Includes all stats gained when leveling (including base AD gained), but does not include stats at level 1.}}, '''Kai'Sa''' can evolve the related [[champion ability|basic ability]] after being in [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]] for 2 seconds. The upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.
i1.notes:
* '''Kai'Sa''' receives the evolution even if she dies while in cast time.
* '''Kai'Sa''' can evolve an ability even if she hasn't learned it yet.
* Allied {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects '''cannot''' rupture the {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}.
* {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} which exceeds the 5th stack is applied normally.
* Stats from runes do not count toward the minimum requirement to upgrade a [[champion ability|basic ability]].
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} application from {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}} only.

r1.name: Killer Instinct
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' instantly {{tip|shields}} herself for 2 seconds and swiftly {{tip|dashes}} to a target location near a {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion {{tt|recently affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}|4 seconds after it's stacked or ruptured}}. The shield's duration refreshes once the dash ends.
''Killer Instinct'' {{tip|Basic attack reset|resets}} '''Kai'Sa's''' basic attack timer.
r1.notes:
* '''Kai'Sa''' will issue a movement command to the targeted location regardless of whether the target location is valid. The dash is not buffered during this movement command. '''Kai'Sa''' will not dash if the targeted location becomes valid by walking in range or a nearby enemy champion becomes affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}.
** If the targeted location is not valid, the range indicator will glow.
* The enemy champion recently affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} must be in range of '''Kai'Sa''' for the targeted location to be valid, and not the targeted location itself.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.

effects.str: • Shield Strength: (+ % AD) (+ 75% AP)
